member.name: T:Rant.Engine.Constructs.AttribPersistence
member.summary: Defines persistence modes for block attributes.

member.name: F:Rant.Engine.Constructs.AttribPersistence.Off
member.summary: The next block consumes attributes immediately.

member.name: F:Rant.Engine.Constructs.AttribPersistence.Outer
member.summary: The next block consumes attributes and restores them when finished.

member.name: F:Rant.Engine.Constructs.AttribPersistence.OuterShared
member.summary: The next block uses but does not consume attributes. They are inherited by and restored at the end of each child block.

member.name: F:Rant.Engine.Constructs.AttribPersistence.Inner
member.summary: The current attributes are inherited by all blocks inside the current block. They are consumed at the end of the block.

member.name: F:Rant.Engine.Constructs.AttribPersistence.InnerShared
member.summary: The current attributes are inherited by all blocks inside the current block, as well as their children. They are consumed at the end of the block.

member.name: F:Rant.Engine.Constructs.AttribPersistence.ReadOnly
member.summary: Disable changes to the current block attributes until the persistence mode is changed.

member.name: F:Rant.Engine.Constructs.AttribPersistence.Once
member.summary: Attributes will persist over the next block, but any block after or inside it will consume them.

member.name: F:Rant.Engine.Constructs.AttribPersistence.On
member.summary: The next block uses but does not consume attributes. This also affects child blocks.

The random number generator to use with index calculation.
